nodes.id: The Awakening of the Eternal Archive

nodes.description: The Eternal Library awakens with subtle magic, drawing seekers into its living depths.
Ignition of the Archival Nexus in the Core Sanctum sparks the Awakening, infusing the Eternal Library with subtle magic.
Waves of Magic cascade from the Awakening, infusing the Eternal Library with subtle enchantments and birthing interactive lore across its infinite expanse.
